website_summaries.verdict: Big, burly dive watch with solid stainless steel bezel and rubber strap with yellow accents.
pros: Features the reliable ETA C01.211 automatic movement with a 46-hour power reserve
Luminescent hands and markers for night visibility
cons: Strap can be short and confining

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch ... I get components all the time and quality is top notch. Med to large size but not too large for me, I have a medium size wrist. Band is very good quality, not very flexible but confortable. Recommend if you are looking for a sports watch that grabs attention.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timepiece
customer_reviews.text: So far a great watch. Beautiful skeleton back. Excellent price for 15 jewels watch. Watch strap is bit tight/short(i have fat wrists). But overall a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: problem with winding.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold winding soon after I bought it. I sent it outside USA as a gift, had to bring it back and now after 2 months I sent to Asurion/Amazon repair still don't have the watch back. Very sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible warranty service!!!
customer_reviews.text: My product was defective and it has been in repair for 12 weeks... they originally said 6 weeks and it’s turning into 12 weeks now and I still don’t have the watch!!! Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: watch is even better than I thought hands sit very high for a ...
customer_reviews.text: watch is even better than I thought hands sit very high for a chronograph makes watch real easy to read best automatic in this price range
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Think I would prefer a metal strap with a clasp but that's minor. It is a big watch so be sure have a idea of how it will sit on you wrist before you buy. Like the face and have been using the timer all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid F Somait

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: The watch is little bit too big for my wrist though I like the design
customer_reviews.author: Kittidej Sirijaroonchai

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I order two of them and good price Love it
customer_reviews.author: YOO OUM

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed, very accurate
customer_reviews.text: The watch is superb. Beautifully designed, very accurate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work properly after a few time of purchase. i did not use it to much, however it stops working. I had to use the warranty service to get it repair
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Viasus

customer_reviews.title: I realized the date change occurs around 1: 06am ...
customer_reviews.text: I realized the date change occurs around 1:06am - not sure if this is normal. I would expect the date changes to be within 15 mins..
customer_reviews.author: sam_angks

customer_reviews.title: Great Time Piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful time piece. The price was excellent. I purchased it during Prime days. I wanted to buy another one but was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McCray

product_meta.title: Tissot Men's T0794272705701 PRS 516 Analog Display Swiss Automatic Black Watch
product_meta.description:
Stainless steel case with a black rubber strap. Fixed black PVD bezel with tachymeter. Black dial with luminous hands and index hour markers. Arabic numerals mark the 6 and 12 o'clock positions
